channel.title: ! 508 Moderator Help Please!
channel.description:
I posted a topic on here yesterday about a problem i have run into a problem while trying to make myself a moderator on my server.
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/29m2erq.jpg[/img]
I think i did that right... i followed the tutorial in the "verious beginner tutorials" post. I log in, BOOM no moderator. what am i doing wrong? :confused:
